sentences.en: Abbot looked blank. "I don't quite follow, sir."
sentences.cn: 阿博特一脸茫然。“我没听明白，先生。”

sentences.en: Abbot, as witness to the bond, am I not entitled to something?
sentences.cn: 修道院院长, 做这合同的见证人, 我没得到什么好处 吗 ?

sentences.en: All the priories were made directly subject to the abbot of Cluny.
sentences.cn: 所有小修道院都由克呂尼的院长直接管理.

sentences.en: Behind the hall is the residence of the abbot and monks.
sentences.cn: 正殿后面是方丈和僧人的住处.

sentences.en: His rooms look much more comfortable than the chamber of the abbot.
sentences.cn: 统治者的房间看上去比那些修道士的房间舒服得多.

sentences.en: I wonder if I might have a word with Mr Abbot?
sentences.cn: 请问我能否和阿博特先生说几句话？

sentences.en: Miss Abbot turned to divest a stout leg of the necessary ligature.
sentences.cn: 艾博特小姐转而从她粗壮的腿上,解下那条必不可少的带子.

sentences.en: The abbot decided to hold the initiation ceremony tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 住持决定明天举行传戒仪式.

sentences.en: The abbot did not believe him, thinking that he was boasting.
sentences.cn: 主持僧以为他吹牛,起初不相信.

sentences.en: The good Abbot of Holywood is a strong pillar to the weak.
sentences.cn: “圣林”修道院的主持是弱者的万无一失的靠山.

sentences.en: The old abbot is the most respected person in the temple.
sentences.cn: 老堪布是这个寺院里最年长最受尊敬的人物.

sentences.en: The stele records the reasons why Abbot Faxian built the pagoda.
sentences.cn: “四神咒塔”碑记载住持法现建塔缘起.

sentences.en: Was it the abbot's bell, ringing for him far down at the bottom of the sea?
sentences.cn: 不正是沉在海底深处的修道院长的铃儿为他而发出的响声 吗 ?

sentences.en: We will play a trick on the old abbot.
sentences.cn: 我们要跟老修道院长开个玩笑.

sentences.en: Why didn't the ancient temple abbot teach others these theories?
sentences.cn: 为什么古代的寺庙的方丈不教其他的人这些理论?

trans.tran_cn: 男修道院院长，隐修院院长，大寺院男住持，男修道院院长的职务
trans.tran_en: a man who is in charge of a  monastery (=  a place where a group of  monk s  live  )
